description: Amendments to planning permission dated 9th February 2021 (RN:20/05502/COFUL) for Variation of conditions 1, 25, 27, 32 and 38 and removal of condition 26 of planning permission dated 02 April 2015 (13/11894/COFUL ) for the redevelopment of Lisson Arches, Penn House and 4 Lilestone Street; namely, the erection of a building at Lisson Arches on Bernhardt Crescent to provide enterprise space (Class B1(b ), (c ), flats for the elderly to replace the accommodation in Penn House. Redevelopment of Penn House and 4 Lilestone Street to prove a new community /health care hub and residential units in buildings with basement car parking off Lilestone Street, public realm/landscaping improvements and other enabling works. (Council's Own Development). Namely, to amend wording of condition 28 (Secure by Design).
site_name: Dev Site At 4 Lilestone St, Mallory St, Penn Hse, Bernhardt Cres, Wycombe Gdns And
